content.html: lol at the right wing TV channel inviting us on to "discuss" the question "Is it selfish to not have children?" No it's not. What's selfish is coercing people who don't want children to have children, to prop up your capitalist perpetual growth machine
content.value:
lol at the right wing TV channel inviting us on to "discuss" the question "Is it selfish to not have children?"
No it's not. What's selfish is coercing people who don't want children to have children, to prop up your capitalist perpetual growth machine
